name: Voltage Graphic Novel
detailed_description:
Voltage Graphic Novel is a book made up of comics content. Although the word "novel" normally refers to long fictional works, Voltage Graphic Novel is a mix of comic book and graphic novel. Screenshots below are examples about graphical style.

This first released version of Voltage Graphic Novel will include 10 pages.
Content will be updated during the development.


When Graphic Novel is complete, at least 50% of it has been created digitally by using ProCreate and Apple Pencil.




Voltage Graphic Novel is an Early Access content. That means we develop, add new pages and graphics to the novel. Also some panels of images can be black and white before novel is ready.

By buying this Graphic now, you can enjoy new content which will be added to the novel with the one purchase!

short_description: Explore the World of Voltage and dive into the story with this Graphic Novel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This Graphic Novel is a PDF-file, works in any machine which can read PDF-files.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This Graphic Novel is a PDF-file, works in any machine which can read PDF-files.

legal_notice:
We didn't directly developed this game by using Amiga, although we are not even sure is it possible. This game graphics have been made with using revolutionary dither technology, created with Amiga fans & experts. Developed over many years, the revolutionary DITHER technology enables PC-game developers to reach the next level of legendary Amiga and/or C-64 graphics on their games. We haven't created or invented dither technology but we have applied a little bit adjusted version of it to this game. Through the liberal, almost irresponsible use of DITHER we are able to radically alter the standard graphics into an unbelievable Amiga visual look and players can enjoy 100% retro stylish games.

Now you just have to decide, are you sure you want to enter into the AOSYS?

░░░░░░░░░░▒▒▒░▒▓░ A Unique FPS Game For PC ! ▒▓░▒▒▒░░░░░░░░░░░
